name: Normal Mode
desc: In Normal Mode, the Corporea Spork from Botania Tweaks is enabled, offering pre-Elven recipes for many corporea items. In addition, the recipe for the Tiny Potato (and therefore Galactic Potato) is reduced to 15% of the default value.

name: Hard Mode
desc: In Hard Mode, the Corporea Spork from Botania Tweaks is disabled, and the recipe for the Tiny Potato (and therefore Galactic Potato) is unchanged.
